title:billam-s13-battlegrounds
description:S13 battlegrounds weapons

// Far Future - pvp (god-pvp)
//notes: prior to the quickdraw nerf, far future was an incredibly slept on sniper, with 45 zoom and the elite roll of quickdraw + opening shot. unfortunately, it's now a shell of its former self. you can still make it work with a high handling roll and mods, but you're much better off with an uzume or 1000yd stare.
recommended mw: handling tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=893527433&perks=1840239774,3142289711,3436462433,47981717
dimwishlist:item=893527433&perks=1840239774,3142289711,588594999,47981717


// Far Future - god-pve (god-pve)
//notes: nothing really special about this sniper. use an uzume, ikelos sr, or frozen orbit.
recommended mw: reload tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=893527433&perks=1840239774,1087426260,1556840489,4104185692


// Far Future - pvp (pvp)
//notes: prior to the quickdraw nerf, far future was an incredibly slept on sniper, with 45 zoom and the elite roll of quickdraw + opening shot. unfortunately, it's now a shell of its former self. you can still make it work with a high handling roll and mods, but you're much better off with an uzume or 1000yd stare.

// Extraordinary Rendition - god-pvp (god-pvp)
//notes: top tier kinetic smg. probably the best pairing with a lorentz driver, bow, or agg frame sniper: high dps means you'll clean up targets more easily. again, don't sleep on frenzy for 6s - get a couple of kills and you'll snowball *fast.*
recommended mw: range tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=202670084,3142289711,3643424744,1890422124
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=202670084,3142289711,3643424744,3425386926

// Extraordinary Rendition - god-pve (god-pve)
//notes: the best kinetic smg for pve. literally all of the perks on this weapon are not bad (looking at you zen moment). completely usable in regular content, master raids, dungeons, pretty much anything. the go-to kinetic primary for most builds.
recommended mw: reload tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,106909392,1820235745,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,106909392,1820235745,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,106909392,3643424744,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,106909392,3643424744,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,2420895100,1820235745,3425386926

dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,2420895100,3643424744,3425386926
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,2420895100,3643424744,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1097616550&perks=1840239774,3230963543,1820235745,3425386926

// Extraordinary Rendition - pvp (pvp)
//notes: top tier kinetic smg. probably the best pairing with a lorentz driver, bow, or agg frame sniper: high dps means you'll clean up targets more easily. again, don't sleep on frenzy for 6s - get a couple of kills and you'll snowball *fast.*
recommended mw: range tags:pvp

// Brass Attacks - god-pvp (god-pvp)
//notes: two-burst sidearms are very epic, especially now that sidearms are actually hitscan :). brass attacks is in the top tier of sidearm range, it has epic perks, and it's very forgiving with a 3c2b optimal ttk. don't sleep on frenzy for 6s - it'll be up more often than you think, and you can absolutely tear with it.

// Brass Attacks - god-pve (god-pve)
//notes: you can't really go wrong with a sidearm nowadays - they boast the highest primary dps values and often have really versatile perks. brass attacks is a really strong sidearm option: it doesn't do anything special, but it kills things really well. the frenzy frenzy combo is excellent on any weapon, with no exception here.
recommended mw: handling or reload tags:god-pve

// Brass Attacks - pve (pve)
//notes: you can't really go wrong with a sidearm nowadays - they boast the highest primary dps values and often have really versatile perks. brass attacks is a really strong sidearm option: it doesn't do anything special, but it kills things really well. the frenzy frenzy combo is excellent on any weapon, with no exception here.
recommended mw: handling or reload tags:pve

// Imperial Needle - god-pvp (god-pvp)
//notes: lightweight bows aren't really great in pvp. you're giving up a lot of damage for only a little bit of draw time and a mobility buff. imperial needle is probably the best lightweight bow, though, so that's nice.
recommended mw: accuracy, draw time if no elastic string tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,201365942,47981717
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,201365942,3592538738
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,201365942,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,951095735,47981717
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,951095735,3592538738
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,951095735,4082225868


// Imperial Needle - god-pve (god-pve)
//notes: archer's tempo gets bows to the same 440ms draw time regardless of archetype, so lightweights are hard to justify. imperial needle does fill a niche in that it's the only legendary void bow, and frenzy is such a god tier bow perk with the buff to reload and damage (100 reload!) that it's still probably worth going for.
recommended mw: reload, draw time if no elastic string tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3460122497&perks=2801223209,16392701,201365942,4104185692
